content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, BATE Borisov 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 4, BATE Borisov 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Marko Simic.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, BATE Borisov 0. Pedro (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
Penalty conceded by Aleksandr Volodko (BATE Borisov) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Barcelona. Isaac Cuenca draws a foul in the penalty area.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Aleksandr Yurevich (BATE Borisov) because of an injury.
Isaac Cuenca (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the right side of the box.
Pedro (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marko Simic (BATE Borisov).
Substitution, Barcelona. Martí Riverola replaces Sergi Roberto.
Marko Simic (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Mateja Kezman replaces Renan Bressan.
Attempt missed. Aleksandr Yurevich (BATE Borisov) left footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Artem Kontsevoy.
Foul by Artem Kontsevoy (BATE Borisov).
Andreu Fontàs (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Maxwell (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Maksim Bordachev.
Substitution, Barcelona. Gerard Deulofeu replaces Rafinha.
Rafinha (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Aleksandr Yurevich (BATE Borisov).
Thiago Alcántara (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Renan Bressan (BATE Borisov).
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Edgar Olekhnovich replaces Dmitri Likhtarovich.
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Mikhail Gordeychuk replaces Aleksandr Pavlov.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, BATE Borisov 0. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Isaac Cuenca.
Offside, BATE Borisov. Dmitri Likhtarovich tries a through ball, but Artem Kontsevoy is caught offside.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, BATE Borisov 0. Martín Montoya (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Isaac Cuenca with a through ball.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc Muniesa replaces Jonathan dos Santos.
Foul by Aleksandr Pavlov (BATE Borisov).
Marc Bartra (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Pedro (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Rafinha.
Offside, Barcelona. Isaac Cuenca tries a through ball, but Andreu Fontàs is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Marko Simic.
Attempt saved. Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Rafinha.
Foul by Thiago Alcántara (Barcelona).
Dmitri Baga (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dmitri Baga (BATE Borisov).
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Isaac Cuenca.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Marko Simic (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, BATE Borisov. Marko Simic tries a through ball, but Renan Bressan is caught offside.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Egor Filipenko (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, BATE Borisov 0.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, BATE Borisov 0.
Aleksandr Yurevich (BATE Borisov) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Goal!  Barcelona 1, BATE Borisov 0. Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
